title: Gay ICON! An Englishman In New York (Full Movie) Biography, Drama, LGBTQ | John Hurt, Cynthia Nixon

sources.title: Gay ICON! An Englishman In New York (Full Movie) Biography, Drama, LGBTQ | John Hurt, Cynthia Nixon
sources.description:
Following the success of a movie based on his memoir, openly gay Quentin Crisp (John Hurt) leaves England for New York, stars in a one-man show and lands a gig as film critic for the Village Voice.

Director: Richard Laxton
Screenplay: Brian Fillis
Stars: 
John Hurt
Denis O'Hare 
Jonathan Tucker
Cynthia Nixon
Swoosie Kurtz

Initial release: February 7, 2009

Awards:
BAFTA - 3 Nominations, including Best Actor (John Hurt)
GLAAD Media Awards - Nominee for Outstanding TV Movie
FilmOut San Diego - Best Actor Winner (John Hurt), Best Supporting Actress Winner (Cynthia Nixon)
Berlin International Film Festival - Special Award for John Hurt for outstanding acting
Hamburg International Queer Film Festival - Best Feature

John Hurt also portrayed Quentin Crisp in the mid-1970s in the TV adaptation of 'The Naked Civil Servant,' the autobiographical book that helped propel Crisp to fame.

#quentincrisp #johnhurt #biography #cynthianixon #indiefilm #lgbt #lgbtq #nakedcivilservant
